Krishna is a minimal Jekyll theme suitable for code based blogs and project showcase.

I would like to thank,

Ankur Gupta for his Trio theme: https://github.com/ankur-gupta/trio

Rab Rennie for his CSS only Expanding Menu: http://codepen.io/Rabrennie/pen/WogNvV

For more themes visit - Jekyll Themes

For Jekyll tutorials visit - Webjeda
